name: Landmark Pixel Color by Number
description:
Color by Numbers for Adults Traveling Around the World Landmark Coloring Activity Book with Challenging Designs for Grown Ups to Relax and Relieve Stress.

Landmark Pixel Color by Number game is popular among children and adult!

It’s a free Landmark Pixel Color by Number APP for everyone.

Coloring has never been easier! No stress of picking up colors. Just relax and color by number!

How To Play: 
- To colorize,your brain needs only a finger.
- Choose a landmark image.  
- Then select the colors and put them in the particular boxes you want to color in the images
- Color drop in the same numbers blocks.
- Just follow the numbers in pictures.
- Picture levels can be locked with coins which the player must spend to unlock. Players can earn coins by completing levels or by purchasing coins from the IAP store. 
- Comes with Bomb power up and Magic Wand power up.

Features:
- So many artworks to choose from. Color by number National Landmark
, Historic US Symbols and Places , United Nations Building , United States Capitol , Golden Gate Bridge , Statue of Liberty , The White House , Eiffel Tower , Big Ben , Chichen Itza El Castillo , Christ the Redeemer, Berlin Cathedral , Easter Island , Lotus Temple - New Delhi India , Pyramid , Taj Mahal , Tower of Pisa , Egypt , St. Basil's Cathedral , Mount Rushmore and other coloring pages from easy to very detailed.
- Easily color any image number by number and wait for the surprise in the end!
- Perfect relaxing activity.
- Pixel Art Camera. Take selfies or use your photos to turn them into pixel art!
- Transform any image from your phone or tablet into a pixelated version and color it by numbers right on the app!
- Share with friends on Instagram, Twitter or Facebook Messenger.

Whether develop child’s recognition of colors and numbers, Trains your concentration and steadiness Or just want to color your own way, practice your drawing and coloring skill. Or release stress, want a time killer, Landmark Pixel Color by Number app always is the best one for you!
